mapper.delete: delete from ctas_flt_rate where CREATE_TIME BETWEEN #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: REC_ID, FEE_RULE_DSC, FK_AGREE_ID, FEE_TYPE, FEE_DSC, DI, TRAINS_FLAG, EI, CARGO_MAIL_FLAG, AIRPORT, OPE_STATION, REMARK, CREATE_OPE, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, RATE_TYPE, RATE_DSC, MIN_PRICE, RATE, FLT_MODE, TRAINS_TYPE, COMPANY_CODE
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_CTAS_FLT_RATE.NEXTVAL as recId from dual
insert into CTAS_FLT_RATE (REC_ID, FEE_RULE_DSC, FK_AGREE_ID, FEE_TYPE, FEE_DSC, DI, TRAINS_FLAG, EI, CARGO_MAIL_FLAG, AIRPORT, OPE_STATION, REMARK, CREATE_OPE, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_TIME, RATE_TYPE, RATE_DSC, MIN_PRICE, RATE, FLT_MODE, TRAINS_TYPE, COMPANY_CODE) values (#{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeRuleDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fkAgreeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{di,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainsFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cargoMailFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opeStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOpe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rateDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fltMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update CTAS_FLT_RATE
FEE_RULE_DSC = #{feeRuleDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FK_AGREE_ID = #{fkAgreeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_DSC = #{feeDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
